ISSUE.TITLE: Project name
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: For the UI we need to show human understandable project names. These should be part of the data model for projects, defined in projects.cfg, retrieved via CLI and REST

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #99 from NatLibFi/issue93-merge-hits-take2 Divide hit weights by sum of backend weights. Fixes #93

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Add name field for projects. Fixes #98
Merge pull request #101 from NatLibFi/issue98-project-name Add name field for projects. Fixes #98
